title: Excerpts From The Everyday Unknown
description: A Polaroid of God. A loose edge on the world curling free.The promise of a new vista beyond.These wonders are offered by Vike. To see them, all you need do is become like him.A monster. Meet the girl with the homicidal shadow.Scorpion doormen in Brazil.The horrific reincarnation of Caligula.The Mad Hatter in a gory wonderland.'Trainspotting with monsters' - Huw Edwards'Superb' - Scream magazine
author: Shaun Othen
